description: The healing room consists of enchanted mattresses that heal the wounds
of those resting on them at an unusually fast pace.  Several of them
show faint bloodstains, which make it evident that they were a wise
addition to the ship.
39006.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Healing Room{x

description: The room is a hole dug from the earth.  Vines and roots protrude
from the walls.  The room appears to have been dug by some large
animal as the walls are littered with claw marks.  The ground has paw
prints everywhere, seemingly stacked atop of each other.  The only
other visible markings is a drag mark leading from the door to the
vault.
39182.name: {yHo{Gl{glo{Gw{yed O{gu{yt D{Gir{yt Room{x

description: You stand in the corner of this room where it actually seems to be
intact.  The walls are almost untouched, aside from a small spot of
blood near the floor, but other than that it looks fine.  To the north
the entrance to the other room can be seen.
39109.name: {3Balduran Ship - Corner of the Room{9

description: The ground all around you has grown mossy, this small part of the
forest seems calmer, gentler.  To the east and west the trail returns
to it's worn self, covered with the twigs and pine needles.
39042.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8M{3ossy {8G{3round{9

description: You stand where the path branches off, to the south the path crawls
into the trees where a howling seems to be coming.  To the east the
trail continues towards a large tree.
39047.name: {8T{3rail {9-{8 B{3reak in the {8P{3ath{9

description: More broken floorboards are here, some pools of blood aswell.  To
the north-east you can see the wheel for steering the ship.  Nearby to
the east you can see some stairs.
39145.name: {3Balduran Ship - Main Deck{9

description: At the foot of the stairs and leading into the next room is an virgin
barricade, as yet untouched by a battle.  It is very well made, and it
serves as a fallback against whatever it is that the first barricade is
in place to protect against.
39007.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Stairs Up{x

description: From here, the tossing sea continues to churn, revealing the wreckage
of various other ships.  This vessel, an amazingly huge ship, is upright
in the sand despite the aft third of the ship being broken off.  It
appears that repairs have been made, although not to fix the ship's
seaworthiness, but to seal off the elements and make it more like a home.
Around the makeshift door are claw marks and what appears to be blood,
long dried in the sun.
39000.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Entrance{x

description: The trees sway lightly as a cold wind passes through them and
brushes over you.  Leaves rustle in the trees above.  The snap of a
twig can be heard in the near distance.  Tuffs of animal hair and
broken bones lie in a pool of blood.
39056.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8C{3ontinuing your {8J{3ourney{9

description: The trees lean over you, blocking out the sky and causing darkness.
You almost feel as if you are being watched as you pass between trees.
Beneath your feet the ground feels sticky as you step over the corpse
of a small creature.  To the east the forest seems to brighten
slightly but to the south the trees seem to beckon for you to enter
the darkness.
39028.name: {GF{gorest{x - {yIn the {GL{gupine {GF{gorest{x

description: A few large paintings can be seen ripped and torn on the ground.
Large clawmarks cover the wall to the west, to the east and south the
ravaged ship continues.
39108.name: {3Balduran Ship - Within the Ship{9

description: To the east the floor has completely fallen into the room below it,
creating a pit, from the southern part of the hole you can see a plank
leading over it.  To the west and south you can see cots, dripping
with blood.
39129.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near the Hole{9

description: The path ends here with two houses on either side of the path.
Both houses are humble and small and made from raw logs that are from
the western forest.  The bark is falling off the logs that are now the
house.  The smell of the forest fills the air.
39174.name: {CT{co{8wn - {CT{ch{8e {CH{co{8mes{x

description: The path passes between a few trees and to the west you can see the
largest tree in the forest.  Twigs often snap in the trees, but you
can't see the source of the noise.  Perhaps just a wolf..
39054.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8T{3he {8T{3rail {8C{3ontinues{9

description: The path is now completely gone, replaced by the twig and moss
covered ground.  A few scratches mark the trees, but that is all that
can be seen.  To the east the bushes have been cut down, seems the
path continues that way..
39050.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8C{3urve in the {8P{3ath{9

description: All around you the fields of endless grass continue, you hope that
you will eventually find your way.  The grass waves with colors of
green and splattered red from a recent kill.
39088.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&M{3iddle of {&N{3owhere{9

description: There are many gouges cut into the very stone, seeming to culminate
near a small hollow...  More than just a hollow, on close inspection,
a tunnel!
A pile of {Dr{Wock{Ds{x is here, maybe a makeshift grave for an adventurer.
You pass the large boulder that sits to the south-west.  Upon it
you notice a few markings, upon closer inspection..  They seem to be
claw marks, some with dried blood.  To the west, you can see the main
path.
39037.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8P{3ast the {8B{3oulder{9

description: You stand on the deck of the large ship, it's boards are now
cracked and broken.  Nearby are some small steps leading to a door.
Upon it is marked 'Ca/tai\s \uar/ter/'..  Some letters scratched off
by large claws.
39146.name: {3Balduran Ship - A Set of Stairs{9

description: The path continues around the impassable boulder.  On both sides of
the trail trees grow, and rustling can be heard in the underbrush.
You can't help but feel you're being watched as you continue to walk
along the path.
39036.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8A{3round the {8B{3oulder{9

description: If any mortal finds there way in here leave. Do not touch, try to kill, or take anything.
You have been warned!
39094.name: Leaving Mob storage room

description: There are several lifeboats pulled up along this beautiful beach.
They are doubtless too weak to withstand the storms that you would
face at sea, so they are most likely useless.  However, two of them
are filled to the brim with what appears to be human and animal bones,
most of them broken open.  From here you can travel up the beach to
the north, or go west to approach a large ship-house.
39015.name: {bB{Be{Ya{ych{x - {bA{Bp{Yp{yroaching a {bW{Br{Ye{yck{x

description: At your feet is a large door leading down to the lower floor, to
the north you can see large boxes of what seems to be food.  To the
east you can see a plaque against the wall that reads 'Kitchen'.
39116.name: {3Balduran Ship - The Second Floor{9

description: The wind blows lightly and the grassy ground continues in all
directions.  Beneath your feet you see a few bones that seem to have
been dried over the days, or maybe even years.
39079.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&E{3ndless {&F{3ields{9

description: You have come to a fork in the paths, the ground is quite bare..
With the exception of a few dried bones and pieces of rusted metal.
To the west trees can be seen at the start of a forest and to the east
the barren path continues to the horizon.  To the north is a moss
covered stone tower.
39021.name: {WP{ylains{x - {WI{yntersection on the {WP{yath{x

description: Your ship is rapidly sinking, having hit a rock on your trip.  It
would be wise to abandon ship now...  It is large enough that when it
goes down, it may well cause a whirlpool that will bring you to the
bottom of the sea with it.  Very far north, you can see an island...
You should probably swim over there before one of the nameless horrors
of the sea that you have heard about notices your presence.
39162.name: {bO{Bc{Ce{Ba{bn{x - {DS{Wi{xnking {DS{Wh{xip

description: The crystals embedded in the rock begin to glitter brighter from
the faint light shinning in from the opening ahead.  The faint sigh of
the sea echos about around you.
39169.name: {8S{We{wcr{We{8t{w {8P{Wa{wssa{Wg{8e{w - {8C{cav{8e{w{x

description: All around you the fields of grass continue, but..  Far off to the
west you can see see something.  A house or perhaps a small shack
standing in the naked field.
39087.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&R{3eaching {&P{3lains{9

description: From here you can see the beach to the north, over the side of the
boat is a half-broken ladder.  If you went down it, and let go..  You
could make it to the beach.
39138.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near the Beach{9

description: The trail continues through the trees until it curves once again.
Here you can almost smell the blood of yet another fresh kill made by
one of the animals around here.  To the east and south the forest
continues, as does the stench.
39045.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8C{3urve in the {8P{3ath{9

description: A few trees grow around you as the almost barren ground seems
littered with dried leaves.  On the trees a few markings can be seen,
upon closer inspection..  They are claw marks.  The forest grows to
the west while the plains lie to the east.
39024.name: {WP{ylains{x - {WN{yearing the {GL{gupine {GF{gorest{x

description: You stand in a corner of the room, there is a large wall to the
east that seems to block something off, a plaque sits upon it that
reads 'Kitchen'.  To the west you can see a door attached to the
ground that leads down.
39121.name: {3Balduran Ship - Corner of the Room{9

description: This room is filled with large boxes and sacks of food.  The bags
are all ripped open, some still half-filled with many foods.  To the
south lies more boxes and bags, to the east you can see a hallway.
39118.name: {3Balduran Ship - The Supply Room{9

description: The chilled breeze has been replaced with a warm breeze blowing in
through the one window on the northern wall.  The vines begin to
converge towards the window seeking sunlight.  Odd symbols scrawled
into the old stone wall near the bed pulsate with a red glow.
39158.name: {mI{Mz{8u{Mn{ma{w'{Ms {gB{Ge{wd{8r{wo{Go{gm{x

description: You enter a small house that is quite bare.  The floor is loose and
the walls allow the air to pass freely into the home.  On the ground
is a bed made of loose sticks and soft moss.
39071.name: {%H{5o{8me - {%S{5m{8all {%H{5o{8use{9

description: You stand in the center of another room, this room however has a
caved in ceiling to the north-east creating a wall.  In all the other
directions however, it almost seems untouched.
39110.name: {3Balduran Ship - Center of a Room{9

description: Two more solid iron doors rest on each side of the tunnel here.
They are as rusted as the others.  The stench can still be smelled
here but it is combining with a chemical smell that seems to be coming
from one of the three doors here.  The door to the north is different
than the others.  It appears to be made of a stone material.  The deep
score marks in the ground stop here.
39181.name: {wS{8e{Rcr{8e{wt {yUn{Gde{Rr{rg{Rr{Gou{ynd {wT{8u{Rnn{8e{wl{x

description: A small room is attached to the main building of the elder's house.
Though not large, this room is comfortable enough to stand in.  The
walls and floor are made of logs, and a small bed sits in the corner.
A small desk sits near the bed with a small lantern sitting upon it.
39070.name: {%E{5l{8der's {%H{5o{8me - {%B{5e{8droom

description: The sand is beginning to thin here, mixing with rocks and a small
amount of growing plants, Looking north you can see a flat plain, and
to the west of the plain is a beautiful forest.  Scattered along this
part of the beach is the occasional cleaned and cracked bone, left
over from some animal feeding.  To the east you can see the start of a
path through the plains, and to the south is more beach.
39016.name: {bB{Be{Ya{ych{x - {bN{Be{Ya{yr a {WP{yath on the {WP{ylains{x

description: The trees have completely blocked out the sky and all you can see
is the outline of a few of them as the darkness engulfs you.  You can
almost see figures slip past as you walk, the twigs snapping beneath
each step.
39029.name: {GF{gorest{x - {yIn the {GD{geep {GF{gorest{x

description: Here is where the boat curves to form the front.  You can see the
sandy beach clearly from here.  There isn't much else to see here.
39133.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near the Front{9

description: A small path leads from the town to here.  To the east and west
stand two small wooden homes made from the logs of the western forest.
Both house appear to be empty.  Perhaps the owners are out or just
sleeping.
39069.name: {^T{6o{8wn - {^T{6h{8e {^H{6o{8mes{9

description: All around you the trees continue to grow, some small and some
large.  The trail, littered with the small bones of what looked to be
a rabbit, continues east-west through the forest.
39041.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8C{3ontinuing your {8J{3ourney{9

description: You stand in a room where many books lay, most of them torn with
their pages flung about the room.  A spiralling staircase is against
the southern wall, above it is a large door that leads to the next
floor.  You the north you can see the bookcase that had fallen over.
39104.name: {3Balduran Ship - Stairs Leading Up{9

description: The north-western corner is here, a few scratches mark it but not
much else.  To the east you can see the gaping hole in the ship, to
the south a large bookcase can be seen, toppled over.
39099.name: {3Balduran Ship - Corner of the Room{9

description: Trees encompass you as the trail ventures north-south.  Paw prints
cross the trail, and a few scratches can be seen on trees.  The mossy
ground invites you to continue on.
39044.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8F{3arther into the {8F{3orest{9

description: A few howls can be heard far off in the forest, it's sound echoing
between the trees as you walk through the forest.  To the east and
south the trail continues.
39040.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8W{3alking {8T{3hrough the {8F{3orest{9

description: This is a small cave underneath the boulder...  It seems easy to
defend, so you should be safe for a time here...  However, the ground
is hard and uncomfortable, and the boulder above has the sensation of
stilled yet perpetual movement downwards...  It'll be hard to get any
rest here.
39166.name: {DB{Woulder{x - {DA Small Hollow{x

description: What was once the {3Captain's Study{9..  Is now a zone of complete and
utter terror.  Pools of both dried and fresh blood drip and spread all
over..  And even the ceiling is covered in the red liquid.  All the
wooden furniture in the room has been shattered to splinters..  Except
one large cabinet..  That is dripping with blood.
39150.name: {3Balduran Ship - {1A B{!l{1oo{!d{1y M{!e{1ss{9

description: Overhead the trees seem to lean and intertwine to block out the
sky, all seems darker as the sky disappears from sight.  To the east
you can still see the trees, but to the south all seems even darker
than it is now.
39026.name: {GF{gorest{x - {yIn the {GL{gight {GF{gorest{x

description: These stairs have very little that's interesting about them, except that
they seem to be one of the few unmodified parts of the ship.  You can go
up the stairs, or west to the main room.
39011.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Stairs Up{x

description: The trees clear here, the ground is pretty much bare..  But you
notice a few footprints..  Made by a human!  But they seem to
disappear to the east.  However, up above you is a guard tower, and on
either side of it are tall, timber walls.  They seem quite worn, and
clawed...  But they are secured by a sturdy gate which is directly
below the guard tower.  It seems an efficient defense arrangement...
39059.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8B{3ase of a {#T{3ower{9

description: The room is filled with instruments and vials.  Two large tables
rest facing each other with small and large pieces of equipment used
in experiments.  A smell of burning and rotting flesh is stagant
within the room.  In one corner of the room a large pile of black ash
rests with small chunks of bone protruding from it.
39183.name: {mI{Mz{8u{Mn{ma{8's {wS{8e{Rcr{8e{wt {rLa{Rb{yorat{Ro{rry{w {x

description: You stand near a set of stairs to the east that lead to the other
deck.  To the north is a large wheel, probably for steering the ship.
39142.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near Some Stairs{9

description: You stand on a sandy beach, to the east you can see the plains
which you travelled.  Into the western waters you can see the rocky
ground and far out you can see a coral reef.  To the south you can see
a mass of broken wood.
39095.name: {bB{Be{#a{3ch {9- {bA{Bl{#o{3ng {bt{Bh{#e {bS{Bh{#o{3re{9

description: The room has makeshift wooden floors that are covered in paint.
Paintings line the walls and the edges of the room.  The paintings are
beautifully executed pictures of the local scenery.  A small easel
rests in the middle of the room with a blank canvas resting upon it.
39175.name: {CM{ca{8ster {CP{ca{8inter's {CH{co{8me{x

description: You stand near some stairs that lead to the higher deck of the
ship, where the large wheel of the ship stands.  The railing here is
clawed and scratched, and you can see a hint of dried blood on the
steps.  To the east the main deck lies.
39139.name: {3Balduran Ship - To the Upper Deck{9

description: If any mortal happens to find their way in here leave quickly.
You have be warned!
39156.name: {1We{!re{3wo{8lf Island S{3to{!ra{1ge{9

description: You enter a small shack, made of branches and small trees, that
sits in the plains.  Within it you can see many clawmarks, and pools
of blood.  Against the wall is a small shelf, upon it..  The heads of
many humans.
39091.name: {&P{3lains {9-{& S{3mall {&S{3hack{9

description: The trees all resemble each other as the trail continues to swerve
from the west and north.  Eyes seem to watch you as you step, as if..
Testing you.
39043.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8T{3he {8T{3rail {8C{3urves{9

description: You stand against the wall here, to the north a few bloody paw
prints can be seen, and to the north-west a bookshelf that has toppled
over.  Other than that, nothing else can be seen.
39105.name: {3Balduran Ship - Against the Wall{9

description: You stand in the corner of the room, books can be seen in the room,
most of them ripped to shreds, some still containing a few pages.  A
large desk sits here, attached to the wall.
39106.name: {3Balduran Ship - Through the Boat{9

description: The room reeks of wolf excrement.  The walls are lined with thick
slabs of stone with claw shaped gashes within them.  There are blood
stains splattered about.
39179.name: {rEx{Rpe{yrime{Rnt{ral {8Holding {8Cell{x

description: A large bookshelf lies smashed on the ground, bits and pieces of
books lay on the ground and large pools of blood cover them along with
bits of torn clothing.  Bloody paw prints travel to the east and to
the north and south the boat continues.
39100.name: {3Balduran Ship - Broken Bookshelf{9

description: The field continues in all direction and the smell of salt water is
now carried on the wind.  The slight sound of lapping waves can be
heard.  A trail of blood leads to the west and the south.  A small
shack and be seen to the west and a large ship is wrecked directly to
the south.
39090.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&E{3mpty {&P{3lains{9

description: To the north the mountains grow larger as you come closer to them,
in all other directions the windy plains continue.
39083.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&F{3arther into the {&P{3lains{9

description: You stand near the kitchen of the ship which lies to the south.  To
the north and west you can see boxes of what are probably food.
39122.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near the Kitchen{9

description: This room, although covered heavily with junk, seems to be a
medical room.  A few makeshift counters covered with cloth and
disinfecting liquids.  A large cabinet is here, within it might be
something for your wounds.
39064.name: {#G{3uard {#T{3ower - {#M{3edical {#R{3oom{9

description: The ceiling seems to have caved in, creating an impassable wall to
the north.  At your feet a few puddles of blood can be seen.  To the
west and south the ship continues.
39113.name: {3Balduran Ship - Broken Ceiling{9

description: The ground here is cracked and broken, it looks like something
smashed through it.  To the north, east and west you can see more of
the broken boat.  To the south a set of spiralling stairs lead up.
39102.name: {3Balduran Ship - Broken Floor{9

description: In all directions the grassy plains reach out, but to where?  The
wind blows noisily as you walk.
39097.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&R{3eaching {&F{3ields{9

description: This room is lined with boxes of supplies and weapons.  There is a
table with various items upon it.  Most noticeably a bunsen burner and
various sized test tubes with strange liquids within them.  The
ceiling of the room has a blackened charred spot just above the table.
The wall near the table also has portions that appear to have been
damaged by acid.
39010.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Supplies{x

description: All directions almost look the same as the plains continue,
however..  To the north you can see large mountains on the horizon.
39082.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&E{3ndless {&F{3ields{9

description: You are in the canopy of the large tree, where a makeshift
treehouse has been made.  There is little here besides a bed and a
small box.  It does, however, appear to be a safe place to stay and
heal.
39163.name: {GF{gorest{x - {yThe {GC{ganopy{y of the {GT{gree{x

description: The path continues through the thick trees, branches and leaves
rustling as you walk, until the path bends north.  A small makeshift
shack, made from scrap wood from what looks to have been a former
boat, sits here.  The door though, is now in pieces, and sits around
the entrance.
39052.name: {8T{3rail {9-{8 A S{3mall {8S{3hack{9

description: You enter a small room with blood drenching on both the walls and
floor.  Claw marks can be seen deep into the wood and you can see a
door leading north, almost falling off the hinges.  Behind you is a
ladder leading back down to the main deck.
39149.name: {3Balduran Ship - Captain's Quarters{9

description: You are floating in the sea, after you abandoned your sinking ship.
A large island can be seen to the north...  There is a strange aura
here, apparantly making magical travel impossible.  That island...  It
seems to be your only chance of survival.
39160.name: {bO{Bc{Ce{Ba{bn{x - {bN{Be{Ya{yr an {bI{Bs{Yl{yand{x

description: The trees open up into a circular clearing, where the trees seem to
encircle you with beautiful green leaves.  All seems calm in this
clearing..  But..  You see something, a pool..  A dark pool that
resembles blood.  Claw marks are rampant on the ground and a few
sticks are broken..
What happened here?
39032.name: {GF{gorest{x - {yA {yClearing{x

description: You enter the small shack, the ground is covered with splinters of
the door.  On the ground and walls clawmarks are visible, there is no
blood though.  Around you the air seems cold, it feels like something
is in here, but..  What?
39053.name: {#M{3age's {#H{3ouse - {#M{3ain {#R{3oom{9

description: You stand on the main deck of the broken ship, to the west you can
see the steering wheel of the boat, on the higher deck.  To the north,
east and south, the main deck continues.
39137.name: {3Balduran Ship - Main Deck{9

description: Here you can see into the western ocean of the island.  To the
south-west you can see some stairs leading to a large door, and to the
south-east you can see a large hole in the floor of the main deck.
39144.name: {3Balduran Ship - Searching Around{9

description: The ground is slightly worn but doesn't look to have been travelled
much. To the west trees are clearly visible.. and through the trees you
can almost see a pair of dark red eyes.  To the east, a few bones can
be seen littering the path.
39023.name: {WP{ylains{x - {WO{yff the {WM{yain {WP{yath{x

description: You stand in a large open field that spans for miles in all
directions except to the south, where a small village lies.  What
appears to be a large ship can be seen far away in the north western
direction.
39074.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&N{3ear the {&T{3own{9

description: This house is quite bare.  The walls and floor are made of logs
from the western forest and there is a small bed made of sticks and
moss in the corner.
39072.name: {CH{co{8me to a {CM{ca{8ster {CP{cr{8iestess{x

description: From here you can see the western ocean, it's watter shimmers
almost magically.  To the south you can see some stairs, leading to
some strange door.
39147.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near the Ocean{9

description: This room has two beds.  One is neat and tidy, the other is dirty
and messy.  The cabinets to either side are quite the same, with
notches and rough edges on one, and books and sanded edges on the
other.
39165.name: {yRooms{x -{y Uinae and Nehogaya{x

description: A few miles to the north are tall mountains, they seem impassible
as the flat mountain faces lead almost straight up into the clouds.
39084.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&M{3iddle of {&N{3owhere{9

description: Around you a few bushes can be seen as you walk through the plains
towards the town.  Near one bush you can see a few prints from what
seems to have been a large dog but disappear off into the west.  To
the east the path continues into the greener part of the plains.
39022.name: {&P{3lains{9 - {&B{3eginning of a {&T{3rail{9

description: The trail continues east-west, but to the east it seems to clear
around a large wooden building.  The ground is soft with deep claw
marks.  There is a small rustle coming from a nearby bush and a vaint
howl echoes from the forest.
39058.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8N{3ear the {8C{3learing{9

description: The trail passes through the light forest, on each side of the path
large bushes and matured trees grow creating a quaint path.  In the
west the plains seem distant and to the north the trail weaves its way
into the trees.
39034.name: {8T{3rail{9 - {8T{3hrough the {GL{gight {GF{gorest{9

description: The mountains to the north are large and completely impassiable.
The breeze seems to pick up speed as it rolls through the nearly flat
plains and causes the grass to wave much like the waves of an ocean.
39085.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&T{3he {&M{3ountains{9

description: The trail continues through the light forest until it comes upon a
large boulder that looks to be impossible to pass until you notice
that a smaller trail passes around it to the east.
39035.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8A B{3arrier{9

description: Trees around you almost seem to watch you as you pass.  No sound
can be heard except your own steps as you continue walking.  The trail
bends from the south to the east.  The ground is marked with clawmarks
and littered with leaves and broken bones.
39057.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8B{3end in the {8T{3rail{9

description: You can see the mast lying on the beach to the south-east.  It
seems to have snapped right off the boat, perhaps it was a strong
wind?  To the north-east you can see the tip of the boat, to the west
you can see stairs to the upper deck.
39136.name: {3Balduran Ship - The Broken Mast{9

description: This room has one large bed against a wall, stuffed with wolf fur.
On either side of the bed is a small cabinet.  One has a sharpening
stone on it, along with a set of paints and a needle.  The other has a
variety of religious items, featuring most prominantly a holy symbol
of Helm.
39164.name: {yRooms{x -{y Imako and Oleilas{x

description: This room looks to have been hit by a meteor.  Boxes are half
smashed and broken open with their contents gone.  But, one box,
underneath a few broken ones, seems to have been left alone..
39061.name: {#G{3uard {#R{3oom - {#S{3upply {#R{3oom{9

description: The floor shows wear from heavy traffic.  Some of the planks have
been recently replaced and are of a different type of wood from the
rest.  Though the craftsmanship is near perfect.  Chatter can be heard
coming from the rooms both north and south.  There is a smell of mixed
musk and freshness coming from the south.
39004.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Living Quarters{x

description: A few paw prints from a seemingly large animal lead from the east
to the west here.  The winds pick up lightly as you continue on.
39080.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&W{3indy {&P{3lains{9

description: A small hallway stretches north/south from the {3Captain's Quarters{9
to the captain's personal study.  On each side of the hallway the
wooden walls have been scratched by god knows what..  And a trail of
blood starts, and leads to the north..
39151.name: {3Balduran Ship - Hallway to Study{9

description: You stand in a partially caved in room, to the north the floor
leans down until it drops completely vertical into the room below.  To
the west you can see a few cots, some covered with blood.  To the
south you can see some spiral stairs leading up.
39152.name: {3Balduran Ship - Caved in Floor{9

description: The room has makeshift wooden floors and is loosely constructed out
of large logs.  Various materials lay littered about the room.
Baskets full of wolf's fur and cured leathers lay about the room.  A
small loom rests in the corner of the room with a strange shiny thread
within it.
39176.name: {8The {CH{co{8me of a {CM{cy{8stical {CS{cm{8ith{x

description: A large pile of sticks and branches stands here that blocks the
passage north, though easily moveable..  It looks to stop people from
venturing off.  To the north you see a large grassy plain that is
almost completely flat, aside from an odd hill here and there.
39067.name: {^T{6o{8wn - {^N{6o{8rthern {^G{6a{8te{9

description: The trail continues through the trees, shadows cast upon the mossy
ground as you continue your trek into the forest.  The trees, to both
the east and west, continue.
39046.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8T{3hrough the {8T{3rees{9

description: You stand on the creaking boards of the main deck.  To the west you
can see the upper deck, and to the east you can see the tip of the
boat.  In all the other directions the main deck continues.
39134.name: {3Balduran Ship - Middle of the Deck{9

description: The tall trees encircle you as your journey continues, you can
barely see the sky from here and the path seems to darken to the west,
to the east the plains can be seen through the trees.  Beneath your
feet the dried leaves continue to crunch as you step.
39025.name: {GF{gorest{x - {yEntering the {GF{gorest{x

description: You stand near the edge of the boat, the railing here is broken and
you can see bits of torn cloth hanging from it.  To the west you can
see some stairs leading to the upper deck, to the south and east you
can see more of the main deck.
39135.name: {3Balduran Ship - Edge of the Boat{9

description: The trail continues here, to the west a large tower can be seen
that looks to be guarding something, you wonder what it could be until
you peer to the east and see a few buildings..  A small town.
39063.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8T{3owards the {^T{6o{8wn{9

description: Upon the sandy beach lays a large boat, broken in many places
including a gaping hole in the hull of it.  Upon the deck a large
piece of shattered wood stands, about as wide as a large tree, where
the mast used to stand.  And still in full sail is the rest of it,
floating in the water.
39096.name: {bB{Be{#a{3ch {9- {bS{Bh{#i{3p {bW{Br{#e{3ck{9

description: Within this room a large bookshelf rests to the north, many books
lay on the ground and many are ripped from the shelf and pages are
sprawled about.  In the center of the room is a large symbol that
looks to have been etched into the cracked wood.  The symbol almost
pulsates with a magical aura.
39062.name: {#G{3uard {#T{3ower - {#M{3agical {#S{3tudy{9

description: The trees surround you as the small trail leads north-south into
the forest.  You can still hear a deep howling, but you can't be sure
where it's coming from.  The ground, now covered in small sticks pine
needles cracks lightly as you step.
39048.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8S{3mall {8T{3rail{9

description: The room is amazingly neat and furnished compared to the other
rooms.  Large stacks of ancient tomes lie about the room, some nearly
reaching the ceiling.  A single chair rests towards the back of the
room.  Parchments and large scrolls hang from the wall with what would
appear to be gibberish to a normal person.
39184.name: {mI{Mz{8u{Mn{ma{8's {wS{8e{Rcr{8e{wt {yL{Ga{gi{yr{x

description: The plains you are standing in stretch to the north and east, with
a well-worn path leading north.  There is little of interest here.
You can travel further into the field by going north, or go back south
to the edge of a beach.
39018.name: {WP{ylains{x - {yA {WP{yath near the {bB{Be{Ya{ych{x

description: You stand in the 'middle' of the small town, even though it's not
very large..  This seems to be the meeting place of the few members of
the town.  To the north you can see something blocking the trail
north.  To the east a large building stands made of wood.  To the
south smaller buildings stand, they looks like houses.  And to the
west the entrance of the town lies.
39066.name: {^T{6o{8wn - {^C{6e{8nter of {^T{6o{8wn{9

description: These stairs have very little that's interesting about them, except that
they seem to be unchanged from their original form.  You can go west to
the main area of the living quarters, or go down the stairs.
39012.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Stairs Down{x

description: You stand in the broken hull of the large ship, all around you
things lay on the ground, mostly broken wood.  To the south and west
the hull continues, but to the east lies a wall.
39103.name: {3Balduran Ship - Broken Boat{9

description: The grassy field waves much like an ocean would from the wind which
carries the saltwater smell upon it's warm touch.  The sound of ocean
waves has gotten slightly louder and the blood trail has begun to
stain the ground.
39092.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&M{3iddle of {&N{3owhere{9

description: The room reeks of wolf excrement.  The walls are lined with thick
slabs of stone with claw shaped gashes within them.  There are blood
stains splattered about.  Odd markings within the stone wall are
present and appear to be a rude attempt of writing.
39180.name: {rEx{Rpe{yrime{Rnt{ral {8Holding {8Cell{x

description: You stand against the wall, within the large room.  Books can be
seen, sprawled about the floor, to the south west.  All around you the
ship seems quite sturdy.
39098.name: {3Balduran Ship - Against the Wall{9

description: This room is filled with cots, most of them are covered in blood,
but you can manage to find a few that aren't.  To the north, west and
south you can see more.  To the north-east you can see that the floor
has caved into the room below.
39128.name: {3Balduran Ship - Bloody Beds{9

description: You can see a few bunk beds against the southern wall, they are all
scratched up and covered with blood.  It looks like everyone was
killed in their sleep.  To the east lie a few more beds.
39127.name: {3Balduran Ship - Sleeping Quarters{9

description: The small trail continues through the trees and begins to curve
from the west to the north.  The ground here is covered with a few
bones and some fresh blood.  The forest continues to the north and
west.
39055.name: {8T{3rail {9-{8 A{3nother {8B{3end{9

description: The plains reach far off in all directions, you feel lost as you
peer off into the distance and see nothing.  All around you the grassy
ground waves lightly in the wind.
39077.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&M{3ore of {&N{3othing{9

description: You continue walking and on the ground you can see a bloody corpse
of some kind of animal that once resided in this large field, a few
claw marks surround the bloody mass and trail off into the distance.
39078.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&G{3rassy {&F{3ields{9

description: You stand in the middle of large trees, complete darkness engulfs
you, you can almost hear the trees cackling evilly as you walk through
the shadows.  But wait..  To the north you can almost see something,
an opening in the trees.
39031.name: {GF{gorest{x - {GA{gpproaching {ya Clearing

description: The ground is covered with a few drips of blood that trail to the
west, perhaps there was a battle here.  To the east and south the
broken boat continues, to the north lies the large hole for an
entrance to the boat.
39101.name: {3Balduran Ship - Center of the Room{9

description: The sand gives way here to a grassy field, which stretches to the
north and east.  A well-used path leads north, but it's not easy to
tell whether it was made by animal or man.  You can follow the path to
the north, or you can return to the beach by going west.
39017.name: {bB{Be{Ya{ych{x - {bS{Bt{Ya{yrt of a {WP{yath{x

description: You stand at the entrance of the small town where the trail opens
into an open field.  A few buildings are seen close to the east, and
you can see a path leading to the north from within it.  One large
building is seen from here, it looks to be the home of the leader of
the townspeople.
39065.name: {^T{6o{8wn - {^E{6n{8trance{9

description: This room is much like the main room of the ship-house, except instead
of pictures on the wall quivers and quivers of arrows are hung, along
with bows and spears.  Along one wall of the chamber is a line of what
look to be mattresses, each with a blanket folded and placed on top.
Along another wall, boxes that smell strongly of salt and meat rest upon
each other, barrels of water lined in front of them.  North from here is
what seems to be a mage's study room, and to the east is a room, filled
with medical supplies.  South appears to be more storage space.
39008.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Downstairs Room{x

description: The ocean laps at your feet as you stand on this beach, gazing
around at all the wreckage that has been washed up on shore.  Several
ships seem to have been wrecked here, and they appear to have been
torn apart for lumber.  To the west is a a large ship-house, and to
the east you can travel further along the beach.
39014.name: {bB{Be{Ya{ych{x - {bN{Be{Ya{yr a {bS{Bh{Yi{ypwreck{x

description: The ground isn't so muddy here.  Two large solid iron doors are on
either side of the hallway.  The whimpering sound has become louder
and appears to be coming from behind the iron doors.  The deep score
marks in the ground continue here and further north into the tunnel.
The doors are rather rusted and a foul stench slithers out from under
them.
39178.name: {wS{8e{Rcr{8e{wt {yUn{Gde{Rr{rg{Rr{Gou{ynd {wT{8u{Rnn{8e{wl{x

description: A few bushes have been cut down here, something passed through here
not too long ago, maybe someone..  Or something.  To the east you can
see something, something built of wood.
39051.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8T{3hrough the {8T{3rees{9

description: You stand in the middle of a wierdly shaped room.  To the
north-west you can see many boxes with food spilling out of them, to
the south-east you can see a large oven covered with blood.
39119.name: {3Balduran Ship - Center of the Room{9

description: You stand atop the ship, the large steering wheel of the boat
stands here.  To the east you can see the front of the boat.  To the
west is a set of stairs to a large door.
39140.name: {3Balduran Ship - Atop the Ship{9

description: It appears one of the villagers has created a secret hiding spot
underground.  Within it are a few books, and a small wooden chest.
39073.name: {%H{5o{8me - {%S{5e{8cret {%P{5l{8ace{9

description: You stand near the large hole ripped in the hull of the ship.  To
the east you can see that the floor has collapsed from the upper
floor, creating an impassable wall.  To the west and south you can see
the room continues.
39111.name: {3Balduran Ship - Collapsed Ceiling{9

description: You stand near some stairs, they seem to be missing a few steps,
that lead to the east.  To the south you can see the large wheel for
steering the ship.  To the west the boat continues.
39141.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near Some Stairs{9

description: This room is small and damp.  A small amount of light shines
through the floor boards above.  The walls are thick with mud and
roots.  A slight whimpering sound can be heard coming from the north.
The ground has deep score marks in it as if something heavy was
dragged through here.
39177.name: {wS{8e{Rcr{8e{wt {yUn{Gde{Rr{rg{Rr{Gou{ynd {wT{8u{Rnn{8e{wl{x

description: It's a shipyard!  A large ship seems to have been completed, and in
perfect condition!  Evidently, the citizens of the town had been
planning for an escape.
39170.name: {DS{We{wcr{We{Dt{x {DC{cav{De{x - {DA {DH{Wi{wdd{We{Dn{x {DS{Wh{wipya{Wr{Dd{x

description: You stand at the front of the ship, and can see above the fields of
the island.  To the south-east you can see the village far off.  To
the far west you can see the beautiful ocean.  To the west the boat
continues.
39155.name: {3Balduran Ship - Front of the Boat{9

description: The trees continue, almost all looking the same, on both sides of
the trail.  The mossy ground is soft as you step.  The forest
continues to grow to the north, to the east you notice a large
boulder.
39038.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8B{3ack to the {8P{3ath{9

description: The plains continue to outstretch in all directions, too far for
you to see.  The grassy ground seems perfect for walking.
39081.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&E{3mpty {&F{3ields{9

description: Bunk beds stand against the southern wall, mostly covered in blood
and gore, but one seems like it's almost sleepable.  To the west are
more bloody bunk beds, but to the east you can see another set of
stairs..  Leading up.
39130.name: {3Balduran Ship - Bloody Bunks{9

description: Against the wall lies the frame of a mirror.  Shards of glass and
mirrored pieces lay on the ground and crinkle as you step.  To the
east a spiral staircase can be seen that leads up to the next floor of
the ship.
39112.name: {3Balduran Ship - Broken Mirror{9

description: This is the deck of a well-built ship, that will hopefully see you
safely away from Werewolf Island!
39171.name: {yE{8s{Wca{8p{ye {yS{8hi{yp{w - {yDe{8ck o{Wf th{8e Sh{yip{w {x

description: This room is what appears to have been a cargo area, but it has been
redesigned.  Now, it resembles a living room of a house, save one that
is in the home of someone with an obsession with furs... a soft carpet
of fur is underfoot, leading to some fur-covered couches, doubtless
stuffed with yet more fur.  There is some beautiful art nailed to the
walls, all in natural colors... most likely made with natural dyes and
the like.  To the north is what appears to be a kitchen, while to the
east and west are stairs.
39002.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Main Room{x

description: This corner of the room is covered in broken glass, a picture had
fallen off the wall, and it's glass had shattered all over.  To the
east and south the walls of the ship stand, to the north you can see
that the ceiling had collapsed somehow.
39114.name: {3Balduran Ship - Broken Glass{9

description: A chilled musky breeze encircles the room.  Vines creep their way
through the cracked mortar and weave their way up the walls of the
tower.  Hardened dirt makes up the floor which a three-legged table
rests with no chairs around it.  The stones have odd symbols scrawled
into them.  A set of cracked stone stairs lead up.
39157.name: {mI{Mz{8u{Mn{ma{w'{Ms {wT{8o{ww{8e{wr{x

description: Here you stand within a guard tower, the walls and floor are made
of cracked wood, and along the walls a few rusted weapons can be seen.
To the west a room can be seen that almost glows with life.  To the
east another room that is filled with magic and to the north a few
boxes can be seen, some still closed.
39060.name: {#G{3uard {#T{3ower - {#M{3ain {#R{3oom{9

description: This is a very magically modified kitchen, with a cooking flame that
somehow creates no heat, and yet still manages to cook food.  Berrels
of salt are piled in a corner, and a good deal of salted meat is being
prepared right now.  There is very little food here that isn't made of
meat... and it looks to be strange meat.
39003.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Kitchen{x

description: The fields seem to go on forever except to the south where the
large ship rests.  It is now apparent that the ship is not floating on
the sea but wrecked on the beach.  The wind still persists in blowing
tossing small clouds of dust into the air.
39089.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&M{3ore {&F{3ields{9

description: Here there is a lot of floorboards that are cracked and broken.  To
the north-east you can see the large steering wheel of the boat and to
the north is a set of stairs leading to a large door.
39148.name: {3Balduran Ship - Corner of the Deck{9

description: You stand in the middle of a relatively large building, the walls
and floor are all made of wood and a few small things are made of
metal.  A few chairs, counters and tables litter the room, which looks
to be a living room and kitchen.
39068.name: {%E{5l{8der's {%H{5o{8me - {%M{5a{8in {%R{5o{8om{9

description: The entrance to the cave is dark and glitters from the small
crystals embedded in the rock.  A warm breeze rushes through the cave
carrying the smell of salt water upon it.
39168.name: {8S{We{wcr{We{8t{w {8P{Wa{wssa{Wg{8e{w - {8C{cav{8e{w {8E{cn{Wtran{cc{8e{w{x

description: In all directions the grassy fields are endless, the wind blows
around you as you continue to walk.  In the south western direction
the boat is can be seen and it appears to be larger than once thought.
39086.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&G{3rassy {&F{3ields{9

description: Here the trail makes a large bend from the south-east and the
north-east.  The large curve travels around a small pool of water that
comes from a small stream flowing from the east.
39039.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8L{3arge {8C{3urve{9

description: You stand in a large hole in the floor, to the north and east stand
the original walls of the ship.  To the west and south however, are
two walls that were made by the floor that used to make the upper
floor.  The only way out is to climb up.
39115.name: {3Balduran Ship - The Caved in Room{9

description: You stand further into the plains, and as you glance around, you
see a pile of wolf dung lying on the ground.  Now you begin to detect
the sounds of a howling wolf, and it sounds quite close...  You can
travel north to go deeper into the plains, or retreat south to near
the beach again.
39019.name: {WP{ylains{x - {yThe {WM{yain{x {WP{yath{x

description: The grassy field continues to the east, but..  You seem to have
found a patch of land that leads to the west.  Far off you can see a
beach, farther off you can see the ocean.
39093.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&N{3ear a {bB{Be{#a{3ch{9

description: A hallway curves around the wall to the east into what looks to be
the sleeping quarters complete with cots and bunks.  To the west and
south the kitchen and supplies can be seen.
39123.name: {3Balduran Ship - Nearing a Hallway{9

description: This entryway looks like a war zone... the walls have been hacked
and clawed, and it's obvious that there have been arrows fired at
the door from what looks to be a very fortified area.  There are only
two places to go... forward into the ship, or outside.
39001.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Entryway{x

description: The ground at your feet is covered with bushes and a few trees
begin to sprout around the path.  To the west the ground barrens into
the plains, to the east the trail continues.
39033.name: {8T{3rail {9- {8I{3nto the {8U{3nderbrush{9

description: Due to the hard work of Helm, Psycho, Vaprak, Tsabicaran
This area is open for your enjoyment.
If you are in this room and happen to be mortal...
Get the fuck out before I feed you your own teeth.
39159.name: {1We{!re{3wo{8lf Island Tr{3ea{!su{1re{9

description: You stand on the main deck of the ship, at your feet is a door
leading down to the previous floor.  To the north and west you can see
the boat.
39131.name: {3Balduran Ship - The Third Floor{9

description: You stand on the main deck, you can see patches of dried blood in
many places.  To the west you can see some stairs, leading up to a
large door.
39143.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near the Stairs{9

description: Runes line the walls and floor of this room, exuding magical power.
A meditation mat, with symbols drawn in blood upon it, sits in the
center of the room, and seems to focus the energy... apparantly, this
room was designed to help mages memorize their spells more quickly,
and to provide a focus for priests to regain their god-granted spells.
39009.name: {yA Wrecked Boat - Meditation Room{x

description: The plains at this point are littered with bones, and the ground is
covered with wolf pawprints.  Most of the bones have been shattered,
and torn remnants of clothes flutter in the breeze.  The plains
continue to the north and south.
39020.name: {WP{ylains{x - {WN{year an {WI{yntersection{x

description: You stand in a large kitchen with large stoves, a large oven stands
against the eastern wall, with blood splattered upon it.  The door to
this room is still working, and appears lockable...  You may be able
to use this room to heal, somewhat.
39124.name: {3Balduran Ship - Kitchen{9

description: More cots can be seen here, some still with bloodied bodies within
them.  Most of the beds are clawed to pieces but some still stand.
39125.name: {3Balduran Ship - Sleeping Quarters{9

description: You stand near an archway to the west.  Torn books can be seen in
the western room sprawled about the floor.  The north-eastern part of
this room however seems to have caved in somehow.  To the north and
south, the wooden boat continues.
39107.name: {3Balduran Ship - Near the Hallway{9

description: You stand on a large plank that leans over the large hole in the
floor, if you hung onto it and let yourself down..  You could make it
down.  To the south lies the flat floor.
39153.name: {3Balduran Ship - Gaping Hole{9

description: If you see this room.. LEAVE.
- Helm & Tsaroth
39013.name: Mob Storage Room

description: You can barely see the sky through the thick leaves overhead.  The
trees around you almost feel like they shelter you from something, or
someone.  A sound can be heard coming from the west..  The howling of
a wolf.  To the north, the trees are less thick, as the path continues.
39027.name: {GF{gorest{x - {yInside the {GL{gupine {GF{gorest{x

description: You stand near another spiral staircase that leads up, this one
however has a plaque beside it that reads 'Main Deck'.  Above it,
attached to the ceiling is another door.
39154.name: {3Balduran Ship - Stairs Leading Up{9

description: Darkness is all around you as you almost step blindly past the
trees.  You stumble slightly as the bushes at your feet seem to tug at
your legs, but you continue to walk almost blindly.  Both east and
west the forest continues, or at least..  You think.
39030.name: {GF{gorest{x - {GD{geeper {yin the {GF{gorest{x

description: You stand in a vast grassy plain that stretches for miles in all
directions.  The wind blows lightly as you walk and slowly picks up
speed.  Far off to the south you see something, it looks to be a small
grouping of houses.
39076.name: {&P{3lains {9- {&I{3nto the {&P{3lains{9

description: The walls are made of solid iron.  The floor of the iron vault is
covered in dried mud paw prints.  Little light shines within but it is
very bright inside due to the light emitting from the crystal.
39172.name: {8In{wsi{8de {wthe {8Iron {8Va{wu{8lt{x

description: You stand near a hallway that lies to the east, upon the wall is a
plaque that reads 'Sleeping Qua'.  The rest of the text is splattered
with blood.  To the west you can see large boxes with food spilling
out of them, to the south you can see the kitchen.
39120.name: {3Balduran Ship - Nearing a Hallway{9

description: The ocean stretches endlessly all directions except north.  North
is a sandy beach, with a few rocks and lifeboats on the shore.  You
can also see a large shipwreck near you...  Maybe that can serve as
shelter while you recover your strength.
39161.name: {bO{Bc{Ce{Ba{bn{x - {bN{Be{Ya{yring a {bB{Be{Ya{ych{x

tall, easily the tallest in all the forest.  It's existence seems
strange among all the smaller ones.  The trail passes around the tree
to the west and east.

lies more boxes, to the east you can see the edge of the kitchen.

floorboards creak noisily as you step.  To the east you can see how
large the island truly is.
